comment.text: RNA-binding protein. Required for internal initiation of translation of human rhinovirus RNA. May be involved in translationally coupled mRNA turnover. Implicated with other RNA-binding proteins in the cytoplasmic deadenylation/translational and decay interplay of the FOS mRNA mediated by the major coding-region determinant of instability (mCRD) domain.

Component of a multi subunit autoregulatory ribonucleoprotein complex (ARC), at least composed of IGF2BP1, PABPC1 and CSDE1. Interacts with STRAP. Part of a complex associated with the FOS mCRD domain and consisting of PABPC1, PAIP1, HNRPD and SYNCRIP. The interaction with PABPC1 is direct and RNA-independent.

property.value: Expressed in skeletal muscle tissue of rectus abdominis and 238 other tissues
P:nuclear-transcribed mRNA catabolic process, no-go decay

feature.description: Glycyl lysine isopeptide (Lys-Gly) (interchain with G-Cter in SUMO2)
